 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרַם‎</span>] **verb Niph\`al** ==be heaped up== (compare Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אערמחו‎</span> plural of [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערם‎</span>] ***dam***, so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> compare [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxx (1876), 676</sup>; VOJ i. 25 who compare Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרִמָה‎</span> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (which [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>135</sup> thinks Aramaic loan-word), compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Pa\`el ***heap up***; &gt; [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]]<sup>Zeitschr. für Ethnol. 1873, 279</sup> (Syriac Dreschtafel) who compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***strip*** [whence <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַרְמוֺן‎</span> below], and thinks <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרֵמָה‎</span> = ***bare heap***);- ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעֶרְמוּ מַיִם‎</span> [[Exod.15.8|Exod 15:8]].
